item.title: Making npcs talk overhead?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

if (npcs[i].npcType == ####) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Message"; } }

item.title: Making npcs talk overhead?
item.dc:creator: @zofis7 zofis7
item.description:
@zofis7 wrote:

Hello Its me again and I need someone to help me with this small question. How do I make an npc talk overhead?
This is what I have for when I try to pickpocket a man,

if (npcs[i].Stunned) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "What do you think you're doing?"; npcs[i].Stunned = false;
But it doesnt say the NpcID of the man in this code. So how do I make it so a genie(NpcID=409) say something overhead?
Thanks in advance!

~Zofis

Read full topic
